mutants.code:
def longest_substring(s):
    n = len(s)
    max_len = 1
    left = 0
    chars = set()
    for right in range(n):
        while s[right] in chars:
            chars.remove(s[left])
            left += 1
        chars.add(s[right])
        max_len = max(max_len, right - left + 1)
    return max_len

def longest_substring(s):
    n = len(s)
    max_len = -1
    left = 0
    chars = set()
    for right in range(n):
        while s[right] in chars:
            chars.remove(s[left])
            left += 1
        chars.add(s[right])
        max_len = max(max_len, right - left + 1)
    return max_len

def longest_substring(s):
    n = len(s)
    max_len = 0
    left = 0
    chars = set()
    for right in range(n):
        while s[right] not in chars:
            chars.remove(s[left])
            left += 1
        chars.add(s[right])
        max_len = max(max_len, right - left + 1)
    return max_len

def longest_substring(s):
    n = len(s)
    max_len = 0
    left = 0
    chars = set()
    for right in range(n):
        while s[right] in chars:
            chars.remove(s[left])
            left -= 1
        chars.add(s[right])
        max_len = max(max_len, right - left + 1)
    return max_len

def longest_substring(s):
    n = len(s)
    max_len = 0
    left = 0

def longest_substring(s):
    n = len(s)
    max_len = 0
    left = 0
    chars = set()
    for right in range(n):
        while s[right] in chars:
            chars.remove(s[left])
            left += 1
        chars.add(s[right])
        max_len = max(max_len, (right - left) * 1)
    return max_len

def longest_substring(s):
    n = len(s)
    max_len = 0
    left = 0
